newsitem.title: AUSTRALIA: RTRS-CANBERRA WATCH-Budget bills update at 11.30 a.m. - detail.
newsitem.headline: RTRS-CANBERRA WATCH-Budget bills update at 11.30 a.m. - detail.

text.p: This is an update on the status of each of the Australian government's contentious budget bills.

The analysis focuses only on measures that will or might be opposed by the Labor opposition and Australian Democrats minority party, which would leave the government depending on the doubtful support of the two Greens or two independent senators to pass its legislation.
Other budget measures not mentioned here will pass because they will gain the support of Labor, the Democrats or both.
